text: She Married for Love is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Pasqualina DeVoe - Mrs. Muggs * Eva Bell - Rose Muggs * Raymond McKee - Harry Bounce * Harry Lorraine - The Deacon * Mae Sheppard - The Old Maid * Oliver Hardy - An Onlooker (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: She Married for Love
